sem:triple.sem:subject: /en/quark
sem:triple.sem:object: Quark is a fictional character in the American television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. The character, which was played by Armin Shimerman, was depicted as a member of an extraterrestrial race known as the Ferengi, who are stereotypically crony-capitalist and motivated only by profit.

resource.name: Quark
